basicInfo.name: Bai Long
basicInfo.flavor: Thanks to his superb talent in martial arts, Bai Long is sometimes referred to as the \"Fist Emperor,\" while his lightning-fast moves earned him the nickname of \"Flash.\" Eventually, these two names were combined together to give him the moniker \"Emperor Flash Fist.\

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Tenfold Flash Strike
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals Defense-Ignoring damage equal to 340% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 410% of Physical Attack.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - All Allies
 - Adds Healing: Heals HP equal to 30% of Physical Attack.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Increases Damage: Defense-Ignoring damage becomes 65%.

Skill 2.name: Nunchuck Storm
Skill 2.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals Defense-Ignoring damage equal to 475% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 575% of Physical Attack.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Increases Damage: Defense-Ignoring damage becomes 65%.

Passive.name: Return of a Legend
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Crit Rate Boost. [Always Active]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Crit Rate Boost to 33%.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: The strong, nunchucks, training, dim sum, all kinds of seafood
profile.story: Thanks to his superb talent in martial arts, Bai Long is sometimes referred to as the \"Fist Emperor,\" while his lightning-fast moves earned him the nickname of \"Flash.\" Eventually, these two names were combined together to give him the moniker \"Emperor Flash Fist.\

basicInfo.name: Bai Long
basicInfo.flavor: One night, a burglar broke into Bai Long's shop and robbed him of everything he had. This event spurred him to form a vigilante group to maintain order and safety in the marketplace.

 - Increases Damage: To 425% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Return of a Legend

Self

Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Crit Rate Boost to 21%.

profile.story: One night, a burglar broke into Bai Long's shop and robbed him of everything he had. This event spurred him to form a vigilante group to maintain order and safety in the marketplace.

basicInfo.name: Bai Long
basicInfo.flavor: Originally a trainee of the Auric Nation, Bai Long grew tired of the order's isolationist stance and restrictive rules and left. Afterward, he continued training in martial arts on his own, gradually becoming more and more strong and powerful.

Normal Attack.desc:

 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.
